comments.body:
Can't we make it work on older API levels? We're supposed to run on Jelly Bean and later:
https://flutter.io/faq/#what-devices-and-os-versions-does-flutter-run-on

Right now none of our examples work on API levels older than 19, since java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets is used at startup. Mikkel is looking at fixing that. I'll leave this for now and take another look once the fix is there.
